channel.title: Comments on: SSRS Properties – Tablix Filters
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.content:encoded:
I always try to filter in SQL Server as much as possible, the less data that SSRS has to process the faster it runs.

Also, you can filter on the dataset itself in cases where you’re getting too much info from the stored procedure and don’t want to set the filter in multiple places.
